plot: In an attempt to defend his tree house from some hideous girls, Enrique accepts a challenge which he will surely lose. But in defeat, his memory will be forever flavored with the sweetness that only one girl, Gloria, can give.
title: Pinguinos en la gloria
plot_es: In an attempt to defend his tree house from some hideous girls, Enrique accepts a challenge which he will surely lose. But in defeat, his memory will be forever flavored with the sweetness that only one girl, Gloria, can give.
plot_en: In an attempt to defend his tree house from some hideous girls, Enrique accepts a challenge which he will surely lose. But in defeat, his memory will be forever flavored with the sweetness that only one girl, Gloria, can give.
